channel.title: Lambda Core finale crash
channel.description: Hello, Firstly thanks alot for the mod. Its absolutely amazing and definitely worth the wait. I spent most my evening yesterday playing through it and this morning have made it to the teleporter in Lambda core. Sadly I am now unable to finish the mod since it keeps crashing =( The crash occurs shortly after the Controllers teleport to try and prevent the activation of the device. I've had several crashes before but this is the first one that hasn't been solved by a game reload. Please help! I've included the MDMP with this post. I'm playing the mod on an Alienware M14X laptop running Windows 8. hl2_4104_crash_2013_1_14T12_50_22C0.mdmp (118 KB)

item.title: Lambda Core finale crash
item.dc:creator: Faithfeather
item.description:
Mad78:

Hello,

Firstly thanks alot for the mod. Its absolutely amazing and definitely worth the wait. I spent most my evening yesterday playing through it and this morning have made it to the teleporter in Lambda core. Sadly I am now unable to finish the mod since it keeps crashing =(
The crash occurs shortly after the Controllers teleport to try and prevent the activation of the device.
I’ve had several crashes before but this is the first one that hasn’t been solved by a game reload. Please help!

I’ve included the MDMP with this post.

I’m playing the mod on an Alienware M14X laptop running Windows 8.

well friend your not alone with this issue :-/ sad to see that no one has replied -.- did you ever figure it out :o ? sucks to crash on the 4th to last chapter of the game Dx

Read full topic

item.title: Lambda Core finale crash
item.dc:creator: Mad78
item.description:
Hello,

Firstly thanks alot for the mod. Its absolutely amazing and definitely worth the wait. I spent most my evening yesterday playing through it and this morning have made it to the teleporter in Lambda core. Sadly I am now unable to finish the mod since it keeps crashing =(
The crash occurs shortly after the Controllers teleport to try and prevent the activation of the device.
I’ve had several crashes before but this is the first one that hasn’t been solved by a game reload. Please help!

I’ve included the MDMP with this post.

I’m playing the mod on an Alienware M14X laptop running Windows 8.
hl2_4104_crash_2013_1_14T12_50_22C0.mdmp (118 KB)
